name: The Summit (Horun)
description:
The radio transmitter, which was the only source of communication with the outside world, has suddenly stopped working. Our group of scientists has to get to the top of the mountain and fix it, or else they will freeze here to death!

Controlls:

  • Mouse - Interract with the UI
  • Up/Down arrows or W/S - move up/down the moutain
  • Space - set up the camp
